reviewText: It's a decent DVD, tends to adhere to the same focal points as other produced on the Warrior Monks. Would be a good addition to a school's library or history section.

Below average production values. Was it shot in a basement with a green screen?
It needs a professional sound engineer to fix the audio quality.
When the narrator quotes passages of interest his voice almost drops to a whisper and can't be understood over the WAY too loud background noise of music and/or fighting.
Honestly I couldn't finish watching it.
